title: Where can I find datasets about betting prediction? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would recommend that you use the service from https://777score.ng I think it is a really cool and helpful for those who like betting. There is all the statistics you will need as well as live results. Hope you will like it, good luck

This was found on Data.gov:IRB 2011 Monthly Amounts Wagered at Illinois racetracks, OTB Parlors and Advance Deposit Wagering They have a lot of publicly relevant datasets relating to many, many other topics by the way.
